There's also the issue of the News Corp takeover of BSkyB and the apparent attempts by Jeremy Hunt, the Culture Secretary, to let that go through without proper scrutiny, and finally there's the extraordinary conduct of the police. Mr Andy Coulson resigned as editor of the News of the World in 2007 after the paper's former royal editor, Clive Goodman , and private investigator Glenn Mulcaire were jailed for phone hacking.
